Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People brace yourselves for this summary of the latest news! The Federal Budget has taken center stage with attention-grabbing announcements about a 15% pay rise for aged care workers new funding for renewable energy projects and a push to support those living in poverty. However not all the news is positive as criticism mounts over rising interest rates and the potential damage to the economy. Still these developments represent a significant shift towards shaking things up and people are watching closely to see what happens next.
